game.title: The Lost Treasure Quest
game.objective: Find the Captain's treasure and outsmart the island's guardians
game.description: Embark on a perilous journey with quest giver, Captain Morgan. Your mission is to locate the map in the ancient temple and proceed to the hidden island. Success brings 1000 gold coins and a mystical artifact.

task.objective: Uncover the map's location in the temple's hidden chamber
task.description: Watch out for traps and mythical creatures as you seek the map. Follow its clues to guide you towards the treasure.
